ConsentManagementSPPurposesButtonTitle: See the list of special uses
VendorListGoogleAdsShow: See List of Advertising Technology Suppliers
DataManagementSubtitle: Manage your stored personal data at external partners.
DataManagementDataAccessDescription: You can obtain your data (whether or not personal) stored by our direct data controllers and processors
DataManagementRectifyDataDescriptionOne: Once you have received your data, you have the right to rectification incomplete or wrong data sets.
DataManagementRectifyDataDescriptionTwo: Please enter an email address to wich the data should be sent, at the field above. You will receive an email within the next few days. The e-mail address will be deleted at our system after this process will have been accomplished.
DataManagementOptInDescription: If you wish to exercise the 'data deletion' option, all data that we have stored related to your device ID will be deleted.
DataManagementRequestInformationMessage: Thank you for your request! You will receive an email within the next few weeks (maximum 30days). The e-mail address will be deleted from our system as soon as possible after the data has been sent.
DataManagementOptoutMessage: Your status will be set to 'Opt-out'. Data collection and processing will be terminated. You will therefore no longer receive any personalized advertising or user experience based on this data collection and processing.
DataManagementSubmissionError: An error has occurred, please check your internet connection or try again later.
DataManagementNoSelectionError: Please choose one of the two options.
